```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library("tidyverse")
library("rvest")
library("lubridate")
library("janitor")

```

```{r}

url <- "https://www.basketball-reference.com/wnba/years/1997_totals.html"
page <- read_html(url)
player_name <- html_nodes(page, "th a") %>%
  html_text()

player_link <- html_nodes(page, "th a") %>%
  html_attr("href") %>%
  str_replace(".html", "/gamelog/1997/")

player_link <- paste0("https://www.basketball-reference.com", player_link)

player_list <- as_tibble(cbind(player_name, player_link))

```

```{r}

url2 <- "https://www.basketball-reference.com/wnba/players/m/maxwean01w/gamelog/1997/"

page2 <- read_html(url2) %>%
  html_nodes("#fs-sidewall-right-container , #wnba_pgl_basic a , .right , .center") %>%
  html_text() %>%
  as_tibble(x = matrix(., ncol = 28, byrow = TRUE)) %>%
  row_to_names(1) %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  filter(date != 'Rk')
  
  


```
